metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: This Section applies to thermal insulation of the building envelope
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to thermal insulation of the building envelope

requirements.description: Thermal insulation materials shall conform to applicable CSA or ASTM standards
requirements.exact_quote: Thermal insulation materials shall conform to applicable CSA or ASTM standards

requirements.description: Glass fiber batt insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S702
requirements.exact_quote: Glass fiber batt insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S702

requirements.description: Mineral wool insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S702
requirements.exact_quote: Mineral wool insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S702

requirements.description: Cellulose insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S703
requirements.exact_quote: Cellulose insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S703

requirements.description: Spray polyurethane foam insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S705.1
requirements.exact_quote: Spray polyurethane foam insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S705.1

requirements.description: Extruded polystyrene rigid board insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S701
requirements.exact_quote: Extruded polystyrene rigid board insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S701

requirements.description: Expanded polystyrene rigid board insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S701
requirements.exact_quote: Expanded polystyrene rigid board insulation shall conform to CAN/ULC-S701

requirements.description: Thermal resistance of insulation shall be determined in accordance with applicable standards
requirements.exact_quote: Thermal resistance of insulation shall be determined in accordance with applicable standards

requirements.description: Insulation shall be installed to fill cavities without gaps or excessive compression
requirements.exact_quote: Insulation shall be installed to fill cavities without gaps or excessive compression

requirements.description: Batt insulation shall be cut to fit tightly around electrical boxes, wiring and pipes
requirements.exact_quote: Batt insulation shall be cut to fit tightly around electrical boxes, wiring and pipes

requirements.description: Ceiling insulation shall be of sufficient depth to provide required thermal resistance
requirements.exact_quote: Ceiling insulation shall be of sufficient depth to provide required thermal resistance

requirements.description: Ceiling insulation shall extend to cover the top plate of exterior walls
requirements.exact_quote: Ceiling insulation shall extend to cover the top plate of exterior walls

requirements.description: Wall batt insulation shall not be compressed by more than 25% when installed behind wiring or piping
requirements.exact_quote: Wall batt insulation shall not be compressed by more than 25% when installed behind wiring or piping

requirements.description: Faced batt insulation shall be stapled to studs or the inside face of studs to prevent gaps
requirements.exact_quote: Faced batt insulation shall be stapled to studs or the inside face of studs to prevent gaps

requirements.description: Basement wall insulation shall extend from the top of the wall to the level of the basement floor slab or to a depth where grade temperatures are considered constant
requirements.exact_quote: Basement wall insulation shall extend from the top of the wall to the level of the basement floor slab

requirements.description: Minimum horizontal extent of slab-on-grade perimeter insulation
requirements.exact_quote: Slab-on-grade perimeter insulation shall extend horizontally not less than 600 mm from the edge of the slab

requirements.description: Minimum vertical depth of slab-on-grade perimeter insulation
requirements.exact_quote: or vertically not less than 600 mm below the top of the slab

requirements.description: Insulation shall be protected from moisture that could adversely affect its thermal performance
requirements.exact_quote: Insulation shall be protected from moisture that could adversely affect its thermal performance

requirements.description: Exterior insulation below grade shall be protected from damage during backfilling and from soil contact
requirements.exact_quote: Exterior insulation below grade shall be protected from damage during backfilling and from soil contact

requirements.description: Exterior insulation finish systems shall conform to CAN/ULC-S716
requirements.exact_quote: Exterior insulation finish systems shall conform to CAN/ULC-S716

requirements.description: Insulation installed on the exterior of basement walls below grade shall be extruded polystyrene, expanded polystyrene with protective coating, or other moisture-resistant insulation
requirements.exact_quote: Insulation installed on the exterior of basement walls below grade shall be extruded polystyrene, expanded polystyrene with protective coating, or other moisture-resistant insulation

requirements.description: Below-grade exterior insulation shall be protected by drainage board, membrane, or other approved material
requirements.exact_quote: Below-grade exterior insulation shall be protected by drainage board, membrane, or other approved material
